text:
@AOC Isn't this really the Wuhan virus? Lets call it what it really is based on origin. Why are Dems blocking further travel bans? Are you an expert in virology? Is "Universal Healthcare" like in Chine the answer for this? 
Am sure you can address all of these for the class
